CApsul PipelineS (CAPS) offers various medical imaging processing pipelines.
In order to do so, CAPS provides a Python interfaces built on various
well-regarded softwares (such as Nipype or BrainVisa).


What it is
===========

CAPS offers a catalogue of pipelines (tools) mastered by the NSAp
platform team.
These pipelines are described through live examples available using
the python interpreter.
Examples contain:

* toy datasets.
* snippet of codes provided by the CAPS module.
